dcterms:creator: B. Bischoff
D. Nguyen-Tuong
T. Koller
H. Markert
A. Knoll
dcterms:description: This dataset is used for learning throttle valve control using policy search, focusing on the dynamic behavior of the spring-damper system and complex nonlinearities.
dcterms:title: Throttle valve control

dcterms:creator: Y. Wang
K. Velswamy
B. Huang
dcterms:description: This dataset is utilized for controlling the nonlinear dynamics of HVAC systems using a model-free, proximal actor-critic based reinforcement learning algorithm.
dcterms:title: Heating, ventilation and air-conditioning (HVAC) control

dcterms:creator: S. SyaÔ¨Åie
C. Vilas
M.R. Garcia
F. Tadeo
A.A. Alonso
E. Martinez
dcterms:description: This dataset is applied in intelligent control based on reinforcement learning for batch thermal sterilization of canned foods, focusing on optimal temperature profiles.
dcterms:title: Sterilization of canned food

dcterms:creator: R.B. di Capaci
C. Scali
dcterms:description: This dataset is used for modeling valve stiction and compensating for it using an augmented PID control structure.
dcterms:title: Valve stiction modeling

dcterms:creator: M.A.A.S. Choudhury
S.L. Shah
N.F. Thornhill
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on the detection and quantification of control valve stiction, providing insights into valve performance issues.
dcterms:title: Control valve stiction detection

dcterms:creator: M.A.A.S. Choudhury
N.F. Thornhill
S.L. Shah
dcterms:description: This dataset presents a data-driven model for valve stiction, contributing to the understanding of valve behavior in control systems.
dcterms:title: Data-driven model for valve stiction

dcterms:creator: R. Schoknecht
M. Riedmiller
dcterms:description: This dataset is utilized for applying reinforcement learning techniques to engine control, showcasing the effectiveness of RL in automotive applications.
dcterms:title: Reinforcement learning for engine control

dcterms:creator: M. Deisenroth
C.E. Rasmussen
dcterms:description: This dataset is related to a model-based policy search method known as PILCO, which is data-efficient and focuses on learning probabilistic dynamics.
dcterms:title: Model-based policy search method
